name: Pour Over
description: Achieved by pouring boiling water slowly through coffee grounds.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Served lightly sweetened and refreshing taste of the coffee served over ice

name: Latte
description: A shot of espresso in steamed milk lightly toped with foam.

name: Iced Latte
description: Bold espresso and cold milk over ice.

name: Cappuccino
description: A shot of espresso topped with a deep layer of foamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk served with whipped cream.

name: Iced Mocha
description: Espresso, milk and bittersweet mocha sauce serverd over ice and topped with whipped cream.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Sweetend cold milk marked by espresso shots, finished with caramel crosshatch.

name: Espresso
description: A single shot of pure coffee in a small cup, tastes very strong and slightly quite bitter.

name: Frappuccino
description: Consists of coffee or cr√®me base, blended with ice and flavored syrups topped with whipped cream.

name: Hot Chocolate
